config-localsettings-upgrade: Ae LocalSettings.php file haes been detectit. Tae upgrade this installation, please enter the vailyie o $wgUpgradeKey in the field ablo. Ye'll find it in LocalSettings.php.
config-localsettings-cli-upgrade: Ae LocalSettings.php file haes been detectit. Tae upgrade this installation, please rin update.php insteid
config-localsettings-badkey: The upgrade key ye providit is incorrect.
config-upgrade-key-missing: Aen exeestin installation o MediaWiki haes been detectit. Tae upgrade this installation, please pit the follaein line at the bottom o yer LocalSettings.php: $1
config-localsettings-incomplete: The exeestin LocalSettings.php appears tae be oncompleate. The $1 variable isna set. Please chynge LocalSettings.php sae that this variable is set, n clap "{{int:Config-continue}}".
config-localsettings-connection-error: Ae mistak wis encountered whan connectin til the database uisin the settins specified in LocalSettings.php. Please fix thir settins n try again. $1
config-session-expired: Yer session data seems tae'v expired. Sessions ar configured fer ae lifetime o $1. Ye can increase this bi settin session.gc_maxlifetime in php.ini. Restart the installation process.
config-no-session: Yer session data wis tint! Check yer php.ini an mak sair session.save_path is set til aen appropriate directerie.
config-your-language-help: Select ae leid tae uise durin the installâtion process.
config-wiki-language-help: Select the leid that the wiki will predominantly be wrutten in.
config-help-restart: Div ye wish tae clear aw hained data that ye'v entered n restairt the instawlation process?
config-welcome:
MediaWiki is ae free an appen-soorce wiki saftwaur package wrate in PHP. It sers as the platform fur Wikipedia an the ither Wikimedia projecks, uised bi hunners o million o fowk ilka month. MediaWiki is localised in ower 350 leids an its reliability an robust set hae earnt it ae lairge an vibrant commonity o third-pairty uisers an developers.
=== Environmental checks ===
Basic checks will nou be performed tae see gin this environment is suitable fur MediaWiki instawment.
Mynd tae include this information gin ye seek help on hou tae complete the instawment.
config-welcome-section-copyright: === Copiericht n Terms === $1 This program is free saffware; ye can redistreebute it n/or modifie it unner the terms o the GNU General Public License aes published bi the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 o the License, or (yer optie) onie later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be uiseful, but wioot onie warrantie; wioot even the implied warrantie o merchantabeelity or fitness fer ae parteecular purpose. See the GNU General Public License fer mair details. Ye shid hae receeved [$2 ae copie o the GNU General Publeec License] alang wi this program; gif naw, write til the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA, or [https://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html read it online].
config-sidebar:
* [https://www.mediawiki.org MediaWiki home]
* [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Contents User's Guide]
* [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Manual:Contents Administrator's Guide]
* [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Manual:FAQ FAQ]
----
* <doclink href=Readme>Read me</doclink>
* <doclink href=ReleaseNotes>Release notes</doclink>
* <doclink href=Copying>Copiein</doclink>
* <doclink href=UpgradeDoc>Upgradin</doclink>
config-env-good:
The environment haes been checked.
Ye can install MediaWiki.
config-env-bad:
The environment haes been checked.
Ye canna install MediaWiki.
config-unicode-using-intl: Uising the [https://pecl.php.net/intl intl PECL extension] fer Unicode normalization.
config-unicode-update-warning: Wairnin: The installed version o the Unicode normalisation wrapper uises an aulder version o [http://site.icu-project.org/ the ICU project's] library. Ye shoud [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Unicode_normalization_considerations upgrade] if ye are at aw concerned aboot uisin Unicode.
config-no-db: Coudnae find a suitable database driver! Ye need tae pit in ae database driver fur PHP. The follaein database {{PLURAL:$2|type is|types are}} supportit: $1. Gin ye compiled PHP yersel, reconfigur it wi a database client enabled, fur exemple, uisin ./configure --with-mysqli. Gin ye installed PHP frae a Debian or Ubuntu package, then ye need tae install, fur example, the php-mysql package an aw.
config-outdated-sqlite: Warnishment: ye have SQLite $1, this is lower than minimum required version $2. SQLite will be onavailable.
config-no-fts3: Warnishment: SQLite is compiled wioot the [//sqlite.org/fts3.html FTS3 module], rake features will be onavailable oan this backend.
config-pcre-old: Fatal: PCRE $1 or later is required. Yer PHP binary is link't wi PCRE $2. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Errors_and_symptoms/PCRE Mair informâtion].
config-pcre-no-utf8: Fatal: PHP's PCRE module seems tae be compiled wioot PCRE_UTF8 support. MediaWiki requires UTF-8 support tae function correctly.
config-memory-bad: Warnishment: PHP's memerie_limit is $1. This is proably ower low. The installation micht fail!
config-no-cache-apcu: Wairnin: Could nae find [https://www.php.net/apcu APCu], [http://xcache.lighttpd.net/ XCache] or [https://www.iis.net/downloads/microsoft/wincache-extension WinCache]. Object cachin isna enabled.
config-mod-security: Warnishment: Yer wab server haes [https://modsecurity.org/ mod_security] enabled. Gif misconfeegured, it can cause problems fer MediaWiki or ither saffware that allous uisers tae post arbitrie content. Refer til [https://modsecurity.org/documentation/ mod_security documentation] or contact yer host's support gif ye encounter random mistaks.
config-git: Foond the Git version control saffware: $1.
config-git-bad: Git version control saffware no foond.
config-imagemagick: Foond ImageMagick: $1. Eemage thummnailin will be enabled gif ye enable uplaids.
config-gd:
Foond GD graphics librie biggit-in.
Eemage thummnailin will be enabled gif ye enable uplaids.
config-no-scaling:
Coudnae find GD library or ImageMagick.
Image thummnailin will be disablt.
config-no-uri: Mistak: Coudna determine the current URI. Installâtion aborted.
config-uploads-not-safe: Warnishment: Yer defaut directerie fer uplaids $1 is vulnerable til arbitrie scripts execution. Aathough MediaWiki checks aw uplaided files fer securitie threats, it is heily recommended tae [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Manual:Security#Upload_security close this security vulnerabeelitie] afore enablin uplaids.
config-no-cli-uploads-check: Warnishment: Yer defaut directerie fer uplaids ($1) isna checkit fer vulnerabeelitie tae arbitrie script execution durin the CLI install.
config-suhosin-max-value-length: Suhosin is installed n limits the GET parameter length til $1 bytes. MediaWiki's ResoorceLaider component will wark aroonn this limit, but that will lawer performance. Gif at aw possible, ye shid set suhosin.get.max_value_length til 1024 or heier in php.ini, n set $wgResourceLoaderMaxQueryLength til the same value in LocalSettings.php.
config-db-host-help:
Gif yer database server is oan ae different server, enter the host name or IP address here.

Gif ye'r uisin shaired wab hostin, yer hostin provider shid gie ye the richt host name in their documentation.

Gif ye'r installin oan ae Windows server n uisin MySQL, uisin "localhost" michtna wark fer the server name. Gif it disna, try "127.0.0.1" fer the local IP address.

Gif ye'r uisin PostgreSQL, lea this field blank tae connect bi wa o ae Unix socket.
config-db-name-help:
Chuise ae name that identifies yer wiki.
It shidna contain spaces.

Gif ye'r uisin shaired wab hoastin, yer hoastin provider will either gie ye ae speceefic database name tae uise or let ye mak databases bi waa o ae control panel.
config-db-install-username:
Enter the uisername that will be uised tae connect til the database durin the installâtion process.
This isna the uisername o the MediaWiki accont; this is the uisername fr yer database.
config-db-install-password:
Enter the passwaird that will be uised tae connect til the database durin the installâtion process.
This isna the passwaird fer the MediaWiki accoont; this is the passwaird fer yer database.
config-db-install-help: Enter the uisername an passwaird that will be uised tae connect til the database durin the installâtion process.
config-db-account-lock: Uise the same uisername an passwaird durin normal operation
config-db-wiki-help:
Enter the uisername an trystwird that will be uised tae connect til the database durin normal wiki operation.
Gin the accoont disnae exist, an the installation accoont haes suffeecient privileges, this uiser accoont will be made wi the least privileges needit tae operate the wiki.
config-db-prefix-help:
Gif ye need tae shair yin database atween multiple wikis, or atween MediaWiki n anither wab appleecation, ye can chuise tae eik ae prefix til aw the buird names tae avoid confleects.
Dinna uise spaces.

This field is uisuallie left tuim.
config-mysql-old: MaSQL $1 or later is required. Ye hae $2.
config-db-schema-help:
This schema will uisually be fine.
Anely change it gin ye ken that ye need tae.
config-sqlite-dir-help: SQLite stores aw data in ae file. The directery ye gie maun be writable bi the wabserver durin instawation. It sud nae be accessible bi wey o the wab, this is why we'r nae puttin it whaur yer PHP files ar. The instawer will write ae .htaccess file alang wi'it, but gin that fails somebodie can gain access til yer raw database. That incluides raw uiser data (wab-mail addresses, hashed trystwirds) as weel as deletit revisions an ither restrictit data on the wiki. Consider puttin the database someplace else awthegether, fur exemple in /var/lib/mediawiki/yourwiki.
config-support-info:
MediaWiki supports the follaein database systems:

$1

Gif ye dinna see the database system ye'r tryin tae uise listed ablow, than follae the instructions linked abuin tae enable support.
config-dbsupport-mysql: * [{{int:version-db-mysql-url}} MySQL] is the primarie tairget fer MediaWiki n is best supported. MediaWiki warks forby wi [{{int:version-db-mariadb-url}} MariaDB] n [{{int:version-db-percona-url}} Percona Server], thir ar MySQL compatible. ([https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli.installation.php Hou tae compile PHP wi MySQL support])
config-dbsupport-postgres: * [{{int:version-db-postgres-url}} PostgreSQL] is ae popular apen soorce database system aes aen alternative til MySQL. Thaur micht be some wee bugs still hingin roond, n it's na recommendit fer uiss in ae production environment. ([https://www.php.net/manual/en/pgsql.installation.php Hou tae compile PHP wi PostgreSQL support])
config-dbsupport-sqlite: * [{{int:version-db-sqlite-url}} SQLite] is ae lichtweicht database system that is ver weel supportit. ([http://www.php.net/manual/en/pdo.installation.php Hou tae compile PHP wi SQLite support], uises PDO)
config-missing-db-name: Ye maun enter ae value fer "{{int:config-db-name}}".
config-missing-db-host: Ye maun enter ae value fer "{{int:config-db-host}}".
config-invalid-db-name:
Invalid database name "$1".
Uise anely ASCII letters (a-z, A-Z), nummers (0-9), unnerscores (_) an hyphens (-).
config-invalid-db-prefix:
Invalid database prefix "$1".
Uise anely ASCII letters (a-z, A-Z), nummers (0-9), unnerscores (_) an hyphens (-).
config-connection-error:
$1.

Check the host, uisername n passwaird n gie it anither shot.
config-invalid-schema:
Invalid schema fur MediaWiki "$1".
Uise anely ASCII letters (a-z, A-Z), nummers (0-9) an unnerscores (_).
config-postgres-old: PostgreSQL $1 or later is required. Ye hae $2.
config-sqlite-name-help:
Chuise ae name that identifies yer wiki.
Dinna uise spaces or hyphens.
This will be uised fer the SQLite data file name.
config-sqlite-parent-unwritable-group:
Canna mak the data directerie $1, cause the parent directerie $2 isna writable bi the wabserver. The installer haes determined the uiser yer wabserver is runnin aes. Mak the $3 directerie writable bi it tae continue. Oan ae Unix/Linux system dae: 
cd $2
mkdir $3
chgrp $4 $3
chmod g+w $3
config-sqlite-parent-unwritable-nogroup:
Cannae mak the data directery $1, acause the pairent directery $2 isnae scrievable bi the wabserver. The instawer coudnae determine the uiser yer wabserver is rinnin as. Mak the $3 directery globally scrievable bi it (an ithers!) tae continue. On ae Unix/Linux system dae: 
cd $2
mkdir $3
chmod a+w $3
config-sqlite-mkdir-error:
Mistak in cræftin the data directerie "$1".
Check the location n try again.
config-sqlite-dir-unwritable:
Unable tae scrieve tae the directory "$1".
Chynge its permissions sae that the wabserver can scrieve in it, an try again.
config-sqlite-connection-error:
$1.

Check the data directerie n database name ablo n try again.
config-sqlite-fts3-downgrade: PHP is missing FTS3 support, doongradin buirds
config-can-upgrade: Thaur's MediaWiki buirds in this database. Tae upgrade thaim til MediaWiki $1, clap Continue.
config-upgrade-done: Upgrade compleate. Ye can nou [$1 stert uising yer wiki]. Gif ye wish tae regenerate yer LocalSettings.php file, clap the button ablow. This isna recommended onless ye'r haein problems wi yer wiki.
config-upgrade-done-no-regenerate:
Upgrade compleate.

Ye can nou [$1 stert uising yer wiki].
config-db-web-help: Select the uisername n passwaird that the wab server will uise tae connect til the database server, durin ordinair operation o the wiki.
config-db-web-account-same: Uise the same accoont aes fer installation
config-db-web-create: Cræft the accoont gif it disna awreadie exeest
config-db-web-no-create-privs:
The accoont that ye specified fur instawation disnae hae eneuch preevileges tae mak ae accoont.
The accoont that ye specify here maun awready exist.
config-mysql-engine-help: InnoDB is awmaist aye the best option, as it haes guid concurrencie support. MyISAM micht be faster in single-uiser or read-anely installations. MyISAM databases tend tae rot mair aften nor InnoDB databases.
config-site-name-help: This will kyth in the title baur o the brouser n in varioos ither places.
config-project-namespace-help:
Follaein Wikipaedia's example, mony wikis keep thair policy pages separate frae thair content pages, in a '''project namespace'''.
Aw page teetles in this namespace stairt wi a certain prefix, which ye can specify here.
Uisually, this prefix is derived frae the name o the wiki, but it canna conteen punctuation characters such as "#" or ":".
config-ns-invalid:
The speceefied namespace "<nowiki>$1</nowiki>" is onvalid.
Speceefie ae different project namespace.
config-ns-conflict:
The speceefied namespace "<nowiki>$1</nowiki>" conflicts wi ae defaut MediaWiki namespace.
Speceefie ae different project namespace.
config-admin-help:
Enter yer preferred uisername here, fer example "John Smith".
This is the name ye'll uise tae log in til the wiki.
config-admin-name-invalid:
The speceefied uisername "<nowiki>$1</nowiki>" is onvalid.
Speceefie ae different uisername.
config-admin-password-blank: Enter ae passwaird fer the admeenistrater accoont.
config-admin-password-mismatch: The twa passwairds ye entered dinna match.
config-admin-email-help: Enter ae wab-mail address here tae permit ye tae receive wab-mail fae ither uisers oan the wiki, reset yer passwaird, n be telt o chynges til pages oan yer watchleet. Ye can lea this field tuim.
config-admin-error-user: Internal mistak whan makin aen admeen wi the name "<nowiki>$1</nowiki>".
config-admin-error-password:
Internal mistak whan settin ae passwaird fer the admeen "$1": 
$2
config-admin-error-bademail: Ye'v entered aen onvalid wab-mail address.
config-subscribe: Subscribe til the [https://lists.wikimedia.org/postorius/lists/mediawiki-announce.lists.wikimedia.org/ release annooncements mailin leet].
config-subscribe-help:
This is ae low-volume mailin leet uised fer release annooncements, inclæding important securitie annooncements.
Ye shid subscribe til it an update yer MediaWiki installâtion whan new versions come oot.
config-subscribe-noemail:
Ye tried tae subscribe til the release annooncements mailin let wioot giein ae wab-mail address.
Please gei ae wab-mail address gif ye wish tae subscribe til the mailin leet.
config-almost-done:
Ye'r awmaist dun!
Ye can nou skip the remainin confeegurâtion n install the wiki stricht awa.
config-optional-skip: Ah'm bored awreadie, jyst install the wiki.
config-profile-help: Wikis wark best whan ye lat as monie fowk edit thaim as possible. In MediaWiki, it's easy tae scance ower the recent chynges, an tae revert ony damage that's duin bi naive or malicious uisers. Houever, mony hae fand MediaWiki tae be uissfu in ae wide varietie o roles, an sometimes it's nae easy tae convince abody o the benefits o the wiki wey. Sae ye hae the walin. The {{int:config-profile-wiki}} model allous onybody tae eedit, wioot even loggin in. Ae wiki wi {{int:config-profile-no-anon}} provides extra accoontability, but micht put aff casual contreibutors. The {{int:config-profile-fishbowl}} scenario allous appruived uisers tae eedit, but the public can see the pages, incluidin history. A {{int:config-profile-private}} anely allous appruived uisers tae see pages, wi the same groop bein alloued tae edit. Mair complex uiser richts configurations ar available efter instawation, see the [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Manual:User_rights relevant manual entrie].
config-license-gfdl: GNU Free Documentâtion License 1.3 or later
config-license-cc-choose: Select ae custom Creative Commons license
config-license-help: Monie publeec wikis pit aw contreebutions unner ae [https://freedomdefined.org/Defineetion free license]. This heelps tae creaut ae sense o communitie ainership n encoorages lang-term contreebution. It's naw generallie necessair fer ae preevate or corporate wiki. Gif ye wish tae be able tae uise tex fae Wikipaedia, n ye want Wikipaedia tae be able tae accept tex copied fae yer wiki, than ye shid chuise Creative Commons Attribution Shair Alike. Wikipaedia preeveeooslie uised the GNU Free Documentation License. The GFDL is ae valid license, but it's difficult tae unnerstaunn. Mairower, it's difficult tae reuise content licensed unner the GFDL.
config-enable-email-help:
Gif ye want wab-mail tae wark, [https://www.php.net/manual/en/mail.configuration.php PHP's mail settins] need tae be confeegured jyst richt.
Gif ye dinna want oni wab-mail features, ye can disable theim here.
config-email-user-help: Permit aw uisers tae send each ither wab-mail gif they'v enabled it in their preferences.
config-email-usertalk-help: Permit uisers tae receive notifeecâtions oan uiser tauk page chynges, gif they'v enabled it in their preferences.
config-email-watchlist-help: Permit uisers tae receive notifications anent their watched pages gin they'v alloued it in their preferences.
config-email-auth-help: Gin this option is enabled, uisers hae tae confirm their wab-mail address uisin ae airtin sent til them whanivir they set or change it. Anely authenticated wab-mail addresses can receive emails fae ither uisers or change notification wab-mails. Settin this option is recommended cur public wikis acause o potential abuise o the wab-mail features.
config-email-sender-help:
Enter the wab-mail address tae uise aes the return address oan ootboond wab-mail.
This is whaur boonces will be sent.
Monie mail servers need at least the domain name pairt tae be valid.
config-upload-help: File uplaids potentiallie expose yer server til securitie risks. Fer mair information, read the [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Manual:Security securitie section] in the manual. Tae enable file uplaids, chynge the mode oan the eemages subdirecterie unner MediaWiki's ruit directerie sae that the wab server can write til it. Than enable this optie.
config-upload-deleted-help:
Wale ae directory tae archive deletit files in.
Ideally, this sudna be accessible fae the wab.
config-instantcommons-help:
[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/InstantCommons Instant Commons] is a featur that allous wikis tae uise images, soonds an ither media fand on the [https://commons.wikimedia.org/ Wikimedia Commons] steid.
In order tae dae this, MediaWiki requires access tae the Internet.

Fur mair information anent this featur, includin instructions on hou tae set it up for wikis ither nor the Wikimedia Commons, consult [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Manual:$wgForeignFileRepos the manual].
config-cc-error:
The Creative Commons license waler gied nae result.
Enter the license name manually.
config-cc-not-chosen: Wale whit Creative Commons license ye want an clap on "proceed".
config-cache-help:
Object cachin is uised tae impruiv the speed o MediaWiki bi cachin frequentlie uised data.
Medium til muckle sites ar heilie encooraged tae enable this, n wee sites will see benefits ava.
config-cache-none: Naw caching (nae functionâlitie is remuived, but speed mmicht be impacted oan muckler wiki sites)
config-cache-accel: PHP object cachin (APC, XCache or WinCache)
config-cache-memcached: Uise Memcached (needs addeetional setup n confeegurâtion)
config-memcached-help:
Leet o IP addresses tae uise fer Memcached.
Shid speceefie yin per line n speceefie the port tae be uised. Fer example:
 127.0.0.1:11211
 192.168.1.25:1234
config-memcache-needservers: Ye selected Memcached aes yer cache type but dinna speceefie oni servers.
config-memcache-badip: Ye'v entered aen onvalid IP address fer Memcached: $1.
config-memcache-noport:
Ye didna speceefie ae port tae uise fer Memcached server: $1.
Gif ye dinna knaw the port, the defauut is 11211.
config-memcache-badport: Memcached port nummers shid be atween $1 n $2.
config-extensions-help: The extensions leetit abuin were detected in yer ./extensions directerie. They micht need addeetional confeeguration, but ye can enable thaim nou.
config-skins-help: The skins leetit abuin were detectit in yer ./skins directerie. Ye maun enable at least yin, n chuise the defaut.
config-skins-use-as-default: Uise this skin aes the defaut
config-skins-missing: Nae skins were foond; MediaWiki will uise ae fawback skin ontil ye instaw some proper skins.
config-skins-must-enable-some: Ye need tae chuisse at least yin skin tae enable.
config-skins-must-enable-default: The skin chosen aes the defaut maun be enablit.
config-install-alreadydone: Warnishment: Ye seem tae'v awreadie instawed MediaWiki n ar tryin tae instaw it again. Please proceed til the nex page.
config-install-begin:
Bi pressin "{{int:config-continue}}", ye will begin the installation o MediaWiki.
Gif ye still wish tae mak chynges, press "{{int:config-back}}".
config-install-pg-schema-failed:
Buirds makin failed.
Mak sair that the uiser "$1" can write til the schema "$2".
config-pg-no-plpgsql: Ye need tae install the leid PL/pgSQL in the database $1
config-pg-no-create-privs: The accoont ye speceefied fer installâtion disna hae enough preevileges tae mak aen accoont.
config-pg-not-in-role:
The accoont that ye speceefied fer the wab uiser awreadie exists.
The accoont that ye specefied fer installâtion isna ae suiperuiser an isna a memmer o the wab uiser's role, sae it is onable tae mak objects ained bi the wab uiser.

MediaWiki currentlie requires that the buirds be ained bi the wab uiser. Please specefie anither wab accoont name, or clap "back" an speceefie ae suitablie preevileged install uiser.
config-install-user-missing-create:
The specified uiser "$1" disnae exist.
Please sneck on the "mak accoont" checkfield ablo gin ye wish tae mak it.
config-install-tables-exist: Wairnin: MediaWiki buirds seem tae aareidy exist. Skippin makin.
config-install-tables-failed: Error: Buird creation failt wi the follaein error: $1
config-install-interwiki-exists: Warnishment: The interwiki buird awreadie seems tae hae entries. Skippin defaut let.
config-install-updates: Hinder the runnin o onneedit updates.
config-install-updates-failed: Mistak: Insertin update keys intae the buirds failed wi the folleain mistak: $1
config-install-subscribe-notpossible: cURL isna instawed n allow_url_fopen is na available.
config-install-mainpage: Makin main page wi defaut content
config-install-done: Congratulations! Ye hae installed MediaWiki. The installer has generatit a LocalSettings.php file. It conteens aw yer configuration. Ye will need tae dounlaid it an put it in the base o yer wiki installation (the same directory as index.php). The dounlaid should hae stairtit automatically. If the dounlaid wisna offered, or if ye cancelled it, ye can restairt the dounlaid bi clickin the airtin ablo: $3 Note: If ye dinna dae this nou, this generatit configuration file will nae be available tae ye later if ye exit the installation wioot dounlaidin it. When that haes been duin, ye can [$2 enter yer wiki].
config-nofile: File "$1" coudna be fand. Haes it been deletit?
config-extension-link:
Did ye ken that yer wiki supports [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Manual:Extensions extensions]?

Ye can brouse [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Category:Extensions_by_category extensions bi categorie] or the [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension_Matrix Extension Matrix] tae see the full leet o extensions.
mainpagedocfooter:
